entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to make a world where he can live a happier life. He is accompanied by his companions, James and Sirius.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is one of Harry's companions who will stay with him until the very end.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is another companion of Harry, and he explains that they are part of Harry and invisible to anyone else.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are a type of entity that Harry and his companions encounter in the forest. They have a chilling presence, but Harry's companions act as Patronuses to protect him.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Patronus is a magical concept that Harry's companions embody to protect him from the dementors.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanied by James, who will stay with him until the very end. ("You'll stay with me?" "Until the very end," said James.)
Harry is also accompanied by Sirius, who explains that they are part of Harry and invisible to anyone else. ("We are part of you," said Sirius.)
Harry encounters dementors in the forest, but his companions protect him from their chilling presence. (The dementors' chill did not overcome him; he passed through it with his companions...)
James protects Harry from the dementors, acting as a Patronus to keep him safe. (They acted like Patronuses to him...)
Sirius also protects Harry from the dementors, acting as a Patronus to keep him safe. (They acted like Patronuses to him...)
